ygData.subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Demitry paid for my subscription leh. He also has my account name and p/w. Truth to say, the only important thing in EQ is items, then reputation, then
ygData.messageBody:
Demitry paid for my subscription leh. He also has my account name and
p/w. Truth to say, the only important thing in EQ is items, then reputation,
then Knowledge then finally lvl.
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 09:28
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Fw: I have quit Everquest


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Err, I was thinking of quiting also, but didnt expect u to quit earlier
> than me. EQ has turn out to be such a zombie-camping-training game that
> eliminated most of the fun provided by the multi-race/class char
> development concept.
>
> To tell the truth, even after I stop playing EQ, I didn't login UO every
> night. But every time I login, there are quite a lot of stuffs I can do,
> other than camping/hunting. Both UO and EQ are not as attractive as b4,
> but it's sad that say EQ has more 'push' factor than UO. I feel more sick
> when thinking of logging into EQ than UO ;)
>
> Ziltus
>
> p/s: Garren shld have sold ya acct in eBay instead of just quit. Who
> know, with ya chars, you can earn some money to buy some new PC stuffs,
> hehe.
>
> On Wednesday, 27 October, 1999 2:36 AM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
> [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
> > Subject: I have quit Everquest
> >
> >
> > > Hi all,
> > > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble
> > (which
> > > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with
> > little
> > > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very
> sick
> > and
> > > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999.
> Zand,
> > > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with
you.
> > > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a living
> > hell.
> > >
> > > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope
to
> > see
> > > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to
> them.
> > >
> > > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
> > > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
> > > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the
> same
> > > account).
> > >
> > > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning
but
> > due
> > > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
> > > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each
day
> > now.
> > > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say
it
> > is.
> > > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be as
> > your
> > > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
> > >
> > > Garren The Broken Paladin.
> > >
> >
> > > Singapore Everquest Players List
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
